Select gene & drug

Drug-gene associations based on IC50 and mutation (or gene expression) profile

  • Racksumâ€™s effect size was calculated by comparing IC50 between the mutant and wide-type cell lines. Mutant cell lines are those that have at least one mutation (allele frequency >= 0.2) in a given gene.
  • Spearman correlation was calculated by comparing IC50 and gene expression (TMM).
  • The association scores were calculated only for gene-drug pairs with at least X wild-type and X mutant cell lines, with XXX cell lines for gene expression. The association scores based on IC50 provided by the original source are also provided (yellow dot)
  • Each (unadjusted) p-value was calculated for each pair of drug and gene independently.
